title: Meet David X - Part 3 - Ultimate Honesty
description:
Part 3 - "The Ultimate Honesty" (4 hours)

From this DVD set you will learn:

How to deal with women who flake on you?
How to make it hard for women to cancel the date?
How to take total control on the date, from the first minutes of the relationship?
How staying focused prevents you from ruining the date?
The worst sins in the relationships - becoming lazy, making her not feel special, not taking her seriously, taking her for granted.
Calling her or texting her - which is more efficient and why?
Best "romantic" tricks.
How to deal with bitches?
How to get her trust and respect, to move things forward?
How to win in a situation, when a woman is more successful than a man?
How to become a guy she gets excited about?
How REALLY the women and the money are connected?
What do women want and how can you position yourself with respect to that?
If you don't obey Rule #2, it means that you don't like or respect or value yourself - how can you change that?
How to deal with last minute resistance, and how to eliminate it?
Tricks to get women in bed as fast as possible.
Why the women are emotionally tougher than men, and why male ego gets hurt so easily?
Why the women want guys that feel good about themselves?
Overthinking is a "crime against humanity" - how to limit your thinking and start acting?
How to treat the women who can't handle your honesty, who lie to you?
Honesty as a way of life.
How to take care about relationship well?
How to manage a harem?
Why do you most often loose the women?
How to be honest and not stupid at the same time?
"Let's just be friends" - how to convey that it is a ridiculous idea?
What mistakes take you to LJBF zone?
If you are a busy person - how to manage your time with the women efficiently?
How to make the women not cheat on you?
How can you "repair" the relationship?
How to develop a "tough guy" character - do you need a transition?



If you are not as successful with women as you would like to be, what is it costing you? Your confidence? Long lasting feelings of undesirability? Worry over whether or not you will actually get this area of your life handled?

Imagine your life and all the benefits you would receive by having a consistent flow of beautiful women coming (in more ways than one!) and going? Imagine all of the crazy parties that you would be invited to, knowing that you will walk into any venue with gorgeous babes on your arm.

The long term success and happiness you will have FAR EXCEEDS the price of the seminar.
Now it is time for YOU to make the choice. I hope that you make the right one.

David X
